root.name: Monster Hunter Diary: Poka Poka Airu Village G
root.description: In this monster hunter spin-off, instead of controlling a single hunter, you mange a group of chibi Felynes as they take down cute versions of monsters from the main-line Monster Hunter games. Game mainstays, farming, fishing, and gathering are all present.In the Monster Hunter tradition, as a "G" game this is an updated version of the main release. It features more monsters to fight and more activities.
